text: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

translation.en: But those who disbelieved and denied Our signs - they are the companions of Hellfire
translation.id: Dan orang-orang yang kafir serta mendustakan ayat-ayat Kami, mereka itulah penghuni neraka
